name: Return Policy
description: Customers can return most items within 30 days of delivery, provided they are in new, unused condition with all original packaging.
conditions: Must include original receipt or order number
Items must be undamaged and unused
Certain items like customized furniture may not be eligible

name: Shipping Policy
description: We provide nationwide shipping with tracking available for all orders. Shipping times vary depending on product type and destination.
conditions: Expedited shipping available at extra cost
Shipping charges may vary based on size and weight

name: Warranty Policy
description: Selected products come with manufacturer warranties covering defects in material and workmanship.
conditions: Warranty duration ranges from 6 months to 2 years depending on the product
Warranty claims must be accompanied by proof of purchase
Wear and tear or accidental damage is not covered
